[00:00.19]Written by：Andrew Watt/Post Malone
[00:00.38]It's true that all that you know is all that you are
[00:10.00]
[00:10.56]You said that it's all that you want and more
[00:15.64]
[00:16.89]F**k off and pour another drink
[00:21.79]And tell me what you think
[00:23.74]
[00:24.32]You know that I'm too drunk to talk right now
[00:29.37]
[00:30.76]You put your cigarette out on my face
[00:35.71]So beautiful please woman
[00:39.98]Don't break your back for me
[00:43.18]
[00:44.66]I'll put you out of your misery
[00:48.47]Tell me that it's all okay tell me that it's all okay
[00:53.42]I've been waitin' on this all d**n day
[00:57.55]Waitin' on this all d**n day
[00:59.56]Call me in the mornin' tell me how last night went
[01:03.94]I'm here but don't count on me to
[01:10.50]Stay a little longer if you convince me
[01:13.33]And tell me all the things that you have against me
[01:16.14]Every time we make up the truth is faded
[01:18.80]Everybody's blind when the view's amazin'
[01:21.84]D**n who are we right now
[01:25.06]Can we have a little conversation
[01:27.62]Figure it out with no intoxication
[01:30.37]We carry on what is our motivation
[01:33.16]We're never wrong how the hell we gonna make it
[01:35.74]Maybe we're used to this
[01:38.79]Tell me what are we to do
[01:41.00]
[01:41.53]It's like we only play to lose
[01:43.92]
[01:44.55]Chasin' pain with an excuse
[01:47.11]I love that sh*t and so do you
[01:49.53]But don't break your back for me
[01:53.04]
[01:54.20]I'll put you out of your misery
[01:58.24]Tell me that it's all okay tell me that it's all okay
[02:03.10]I've been waitin' on this all d**n day
[02:07.29]Waitin' on this all d**n day
[02:09.37]Call me in the mornin' tell me how last night went
[02:13.64]I'm here but don't count on me to stay
[02:21.23]

[03:02.60]Waitin' on this all d**n day

data.trans:
[ti:Stay (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:beerbongs & bentleys (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.19]//
[00:00.38]这是事实 你拥有你所知道的一切
[00:10.00]
[00:10.56]你说这就是你的所需 你渴望更多
[00:15.64]
[00:16.89]该死的 为我斟满美酒
[00:21.79]告诉我你在想什么
[00:23.74]
[00:24.32]你知道我已酩酊大醉 我已无法说话
[00:29.37]
[00:30.76]你对着我抽烟
[00:35.71]你看起来如此性感 求你了 女孩
[00:39.98]不要为我暗自神伤
[00:43.18]
[00:44.66]我会让你远离痛苦
[00:48.47]告诉我一切都很好 
[00:53.42]我日日等待此刻的到来
[00:57.55]日日等待此刻的到来
[00:59.56]请在早上给我打电话吧 告诉我你昨晚好吗
[01:03.94]我就在这里 但请不要依靠我
[01:10.50]如果你能说服我 那我就会多待一会儿
[01:13.33]告诉我你不喜欢我的地方
[01:16.14]每一次 当我们自欺欺人的时候 真相都离我们越来越远
[01:18.80]当观念不同时 我们会变得十分盲目 
[01:21.84]甚至不知我们身在何方
[01:25.06]我们能否谈谈心
[01:27.62]理智一点 查明原因
[01:30.37]我们继续前行 我们的动机是什么
[01:33.16]我们到底该怎么做 才永远不会犯错
[01:35.74]也许我们已经习惯
[01:38.79]告诉我 我们该何去何从
[01:41.00]
[01:41.53]我们似乎总是失败
[01:43.92]
[01:44.55]用一个拙劣的借口 去追逐痛苦
[01:47.11]我爱你 你爱我吗
[01:49.53]但请不要为我折断双翼
[01:53.04]
[01:54.20]我会让你远离痛苦
[01:58.24]告诉我一切都很好 
[02:03.10]我日日等待此刻的到来
[02:07.29]日日等待此刻的到来

[02:13.64]我就在这里 但别指望我会永远留下
